document_title: Joint pain: Causes, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Joint pain is a feeling of discomfort and pain in any joint of the body. Joint pain is a common complaint in patients with musculoskeletal diseases. Joint pain has many different causes. Sometimes, joint pain is a manifestation of a systemic disease or injury. (first)
Joint pain may affect just one joint or may affect many different joints (generalized joint pain). The location and nature of the pain will depend on the cause of the patient's illness.
subsection_title: dau khop.json. What is joint pain?
